example: It's the thing that distinguishes the puppet

example: The great majority of school-age Jewish students attend public schools, although Jewish day schools and yeshivas are to be found throughout the country.
example_meaning: Phần lớn các học sinh Do Thái đi học ở các trường công lập, mặc dù các trường học của người Do Thái và các chủng viện Do Thái xuất hiện khắp cả nước Mỹ.
definition: (Judaism) An academy for the advanced study of Jewish texts.

example: 1 As people grow older, many of them focus on retiring from their regular secular work and enjoying a carefree life during their remaining years.

definition: (atomic physics) Unperturbed over time.

example: Let us also pray incessantly and stay alert.
example_meaning: Chúng ta cũng hãy cầu nguyện không ngừng và luôn luôn đề phòng cẩn thận.
definition: In a manner without pause or stop, especially to the point of annoyance; not ceasing.

example: Why do the Pharisees enlarge their scripture-containing cases and lengthen the fringes on their garments?

definition: A decorative border.

example: At my behest .
example_meaning: Theo chỉ thị của tôi.
definition: A command, bidding; sometimes also, an authoritative request. [from 12th c.]

example: Dad, you've gotta fix the aerial .
example_meaning: Cha ơi, cha sửa cái ăng - ten đi.
definition: of, in, or from the air; atmospheric

definition: Having a ready flow of words but lacking accuracy or understanding; superficial; shallow.

example: Still, to be able to die with no special contrition , not having been slaughtered, or enslaved.
example_meaning: Vẫn vậy, để có thể chết mà không hối hận không chém giết, hay nô lệ.
definition: Sincerely penitent or feeling regret or sorrow, especially for one’s own actions; apologetic.

example: Don't be so damned obsequious .
example_meaning: Đừng có khúm núm tệ hại như vậy.
definition: (archaic) Obedient, compliant with someone else's orders or wishes.

definition: An act of disrespect or impiety towards something considered sacred.

example: 40 O, my beloved brethren , give ear to my words.
example_meaning: 40 Hỡi đồng bào yêu dấu của tôi, hãy để tai nghe lời tôi nói.

example: It perforated .
example_meaning: Nó đục thủng rồi.

definition: To poke, to push, to touch.

example: Was it a product of his innate gifts?

definition: Inborn; native; natural; as, innate vigor; innate eloquence.

example: I do hope, Mr. Stimson your presence here does not indicate anything ominous .
example_meaning: Tôi hy vọng, ông Stimson, sự hiện diện của ông ở đây không phải là một điềm xấu .

example: I'm not talking about your proclivities .

example: Here's what Mr Barasa said, 100% verbatim , word for word.

example: Rotary Mills Make the Task Easier

definition: Having rotation.

definition: (modal) In practice; in actual use or existence, regardless of official or legal status.

example_meaning: “Theo lý thuyết, trong 21 năm nữa sẽ không có tội phạm vị thành niên.”

example: Do not slur expressions or run words together in such a way as to make the meaning uncertain to your hearers.

example: You're not going to be Missish now, and pretend to be affronted by an idle report?

example: 3:1, 3) Countless fathers shirk their responsibilities—to the dismay and detriment of their children.
